about.hero_subtitle: Your personal music streaming and sharing platform
about.what_is_intro: Music Tracker is a modern, Progressive Web Application (PWA) designed to help music enthusiasts upload, manage, and share their favorite tracks with a growing community. Built with cutting-edge technologies like Vue 3, Firebase, and Vite, we provide a seamless experience for music lovers to discover and enjoy audio content.
about.what_is_outro: Whether you're an aspiring artist looking to share your work or a music lover wanting to discover new sounds, Music Tracker provides the tools and platform you need.
about.feature_upload_desc: Upload up to 10 tracks (15MB each) with our intuitive drag-and-drop interface. Manage your music library with real-time progress tracking.
about.feature_stream_desc: Enjoy high-quality audio streaming with our integrated player. Control volume, seek through tracks, and keep the music playing across pages.
about.feature_community_desc: Share your thoughts and connect with other music lovers through our commenting system. Discuss tracks, share feedback, and build connections.
about.feature_language_desc: Access the platform in multiple languages with our built-in internationalization. Currently supporting English and French.
about.feature_pwa_desc: Enjoy offline access and app-like experience on any device. Install Music Tracker on your phone or desktop for quick access.
about.feature_secure_desc: Your data is protected with Firebase Authentication and security rules. Only you can manage and delete your uploaded tracks.
about.tech_vue: Progressive JavaScript framework with Composition API
about.tech_vite: Next generation frontend tooling for fast development
about.tech_tailwind: Utility-first CSS framework for modern design
about.tech_howler: Audio library for powerful playback control
about.tech_veevalidate: Form validation for better user experience
